Officials: Hernandez probed in 2 more murders

Former Patriots player Aaron Hernandez is being investigated in connection with a 2012 double murder on Shawmut Avenue, according to two law enforcement officials briefed on the investigation. (2:40 p.m.)

Alleged Marathon bomber to be indicted

State and federal indictments will be announced this afternoon against alleged Boston Marathon bomber Dzhokhar A. Tsarnaev, the US attorney’s office said. (2:18 p.m.)
